title: This 'Magic Prompt' Allegedly Makes ChatGPT Way Smarter—And More Creative
contentSnippet: A new study offers a simple pre-prompt that coaxes AI models to reveal multiple possible answers instead of just one—restoring the diversity lost through alignment training.

title: Bitcoin's ‘Uptober’ vibes hinge on Fed rate cut odds, Nasdaq and tech stocks’ response
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s remaining October performance depends on Fed rate cut odds, BTC ETF inflows and the path major US stocks chose to take.

title: Coinbase Rolls Out the Blue Carpet for Binance’s BNB Token
contentSnippet: Coinbase launched The Blue Carpet, then added BNB to its roadmap — an intent signal, not a guarantee — pending market-making support and technical readiness.

title: Bitcoin Treasury Companies Should Lean Into the Lightning Network
contentSnippet: If you manage a Bitcoin treasury, now is the moment to shift from passive reserve to active participant in the Bitcoin economy, argues Voltage’s Bobby Shell.

title: These Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP ETFs Plan to Offer 5X Leverage
contentSnippet: ETF manager Volatility Shares has applied with the SEC to bring 5x leveraged Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Solana, and other funds to the market.

title: Thiel-backed Erebor wins US approval as Silicon Valley Bank rival emerges
contentSnippet: Erebor’s green light from US regulators is among the most significant bank charter approvals tied to digital assets since the 2023 regional banking crisis.

title: Sony Wants Its Own Crypto Bank Too
contentSnippet: Sony Bank has filed for a crypto banking charter to issue stablecoins and custody services through its Connectia Trust subsidiary.

title: OpenAI Forms Well-Being Council as Altman Eases ChatGPT Adult Content Restrictions
contentSnippet: The company said the new Expert Council will guide how its AI tools interact with users amid rising scrutiny over mental health impacts.

title: The Fortunes of Tomorrow Will Be Built on Compute Power
contentSnippet: In the 20th century, investors who understood energy shaped industries and built massive fortunes. This century, the commodity that matters most is compute, whether you’re mining bitcoin or training A

title: Crypto’s Black Friday
contentSnippet: What began as a macro-driven unwind on crypto Black Friday rapidly evolved into a market-wide stress event — underscoring how tightly coupled liquidity, collateral and oracle systems have become, writ

title: The 7 Largest Publicly Traded Ethereum Treasury Firms
contentSnippet: Publicly traded firms are now stacking Ethereum, pulling in billions of dollars of ETH. These are the largest holders.

title: DOGE holders are buying dips: Is $1.60 by 2026 realistic?
contentSnippet: DOGE holders are quietly accumulating after the recent 66% crash, with onchain data showing that historically accurate top signals have yet to trigger.

title: Ripple CEO Bashes Wall Street Bank Opposition of Fed Master Accounts for Crypto
contentSnippet: CEO Brad Garlinghouse, whose company is seeking a federal bank license and Federal Reserve "master account," called banker pushback "hypocritical."

title: Solana becomes liquidity hub as USDT0, XAUt0 bring omnichain dollars, gold
contentSnippet: Omnichain versions of Tether’s USDT and XAUT go live on Solana via Legacy Mesh, linking digital dollars and gold across blockchains.

title: Indian Telecom Giant Reliance Jio Taps Aptos to Deliver Blockchain Rewards to 500M Users
contentSnippet: The partnership will utilize Aptos' layer-1 blockchain to distribute digital rewards, with a focus on real-world utility rather than speculation.

title: Crypto Bank Erebor Approved for Conditional Federal Bank Charter by OCC
contentSnippet: Erebor can operate as a national bank in the U.S., according to a charter approval from the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency.

title: Crypto-Native Traders, Not TradFi, Drove Bitcoin’s Largest Deleveraging Event
contentSnippet: Roughly $12 billion in futures positions were wiped out on Friday, marking a major shift in market structure and potentially signaling a bottom.

title: The US Just Scored $14 Billion in Bitcoin—Will It Go to a Strategic Reserve?
contentSnippet: Numerous legal and policy questions linger around the massive haul of Bitcoin the U.S. government announced it seized from an alleged crypto scam operation.

title: Stellar’s XLM Holds Firm as Institutional Interest Grows Amid Volatile Session
contentSnippet: Stellar’s native token weathered sharp intraday swings, buoyed by strong institutional demand and surging volumes tied to WisdomTree’s new crypto ETP

title: HBAR Holds Ground at $0.19 as Global Headwinds Test Crypto Market Resilience
contentSnippet: The Hedera token trades in a tight but volatile range as the crypto market continues to recover from the weekend's crash.

title: Bitcoin traders fear $102K BTC price dive next as gold sets new highs
contentSnippet: Bitcoin saw fresh warnings of another dip to fill local lows on Binance, while gold hit record highs on Federal Reserve interest-rate cut hopes.

title: Former TD Ameritrade Chair Predicts All Assets Will Be Tokenized Within Five Years
contentSnippet: Experts say the timeline is "highly optimistic," even as most global markets lack tokenization frameworks and broker infrastructure lags.

title: Options on Solana and XRP Futures Begin Trading on CME
contentSnippet: CME Group began facilitating trades on Solana and XRP futures in March and May, respectively.

title: MIT Brothers Face Trial in $25 Million Ethereum Exploit
contentSnippet: It's "a gray area" whether code alone can constitute fraud in the unregulated crypto industry, experts told Decrypt.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Stabilize as US Shutdown Enters Third Week
contentSnippet: Crypto markets stabilize as the U.S. government shutdown delays key economic data, but Fed signals rate cuts are still on track.

title: What happens if Ether reaches $100,000?
contentSnippet: ETH at $100,000 could mean a $12-trillion market cap. Explore ETF inflows, L2 scaling, staking dynamics and Ethereum’s resilience.

title: Bitcoin to $74K? Hyperliquid whale opens new 1,240 BTC short
contentSnippet: BTC’s technical setup suggests a potential price drop toward $74,000, as notable whales have stayed short. Is the top in for Bitcoin?

title: LuBian-linked wallet moves $1.3B in BTC after DOJ reveals $15B forfeiture case
contentSnippet: The transfer came a day after the US DOJ unsealed an indictment against Prince Holding Group, which allegedly used LuBian to launder illicit funds.

title: Crypto ‘got a passing grade’ on weekend crash: Bitwise’s Matt Hougan
contentSnippet: Bitwise’s chief investment officer praised DeFi platforms for their resilience during the weekend fallout, calling the market’s recovery a sign of strength.

title: モブキャストHD、ソラナ投資に5億円を投じる計画　暗号資産事業への本格参入
contentSnippet: モブキャストHDは暗号資産事業への本格参入を決定し、ソラナ（SOL）購入に向け5億円を投資する計画を発表。ステーキング収益も視野に入れる。

title: リップル、南アフリカでカストディ事業強化　金融大手アブサバンクと提携
contentSnippet: リップルは南アフリカのアブサ銀行と提携し、アフリカで初の大手カストディパートナーを獲得。デジタル資産の安全な保管と事業拡大を進めます。

title: イーサリアムFusakaアップグレード、テストネットSepoliaで有効化　12月メインネット実装へ
contentSnippet: イーサリアムの次期アップグレード「Fusaka」が10月14日、テストネットSepoliaで稼働開始した。PeerDAS技術により処理負担を大幅軽減し、取引速度を最大12,000件/秒まで向上。12月のメインネット実装に向けて段階的にテスト展開中。年内2度目の大型アップグレードでスケーラビリティをさらに強化へ。

title: コインチェックグループ、機関投資家向け事業を強化
contentSnippet: Coincheck Groupが仏Aploの買収を完了し、国内では事業法人向けクリプト・トレジャリー支援を開始。海外と国内の両面で機関投資家向け事業を拡大する。

title: コインベース、インド大手の仮想通貨取引所CoinDCXへ投資　評価額3700億円相当
contentSnippet: 米暗号資産取引所大手コインベース・グローバルが、インドの暗号資産取引所CoinDCXに追加出資。投資後の企業価値は24.5億ドルと評価される。この出資はCoinDCXが今年7月にハッキング被害に遭った数カ月後。コインベースはインドと中東地域での事業拡大を目指す。

title: ブラックロックCEO、資産トークン化を次の成長戦略に　620兆円市場狙う
contentSnippet: ブラックロックのラリー・フィンクCEOが、不動産から株式・債券まであらゆる資産のトークン化を次なる成長戦略と位置づけた。世界のデジタルウォレットに保管された約620兆円の資金に着目し、ETFのトークン化を視野に入れている。

title: ソルメイトが75億円相当ソラナを購入、キャシー・ウッドのアークが主要株主に
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のソルメイト・インフラストラクチャーがソラナ財団から75億円相当のSOLを15%割引で購入。米大手ヘッジファンドアーク・インベストが11.5%の同社株を保有している。

title: バイナンス、仮想通貨の上場費用告発を否定
contentSnippet: バイナンスはリミットレス・ラボのヘザリントンCEOがトークン供給量の8%要求を告発したことに対し、虚偽で名誉毀損的だと反論。取引所は上場手数料を請求していないと表明した。

title: ニューヨーク市、全米初の自治体仮想通貨専門局を設立
contentSnippet: ニューヨーク市のアダムス市長が行政命令に署名し、全米初となる自治体の仮想通貨・ブロックチェーン局を設立した。モイセス・レンドン氏が局長に任命され、責任ある仮想通貨の利用を促進する。

title: バイナンス、韓国への再進出なるか　当局がGopax買収で二年半ぶりに審査再開＝報道
contentSnippet: 韓国当局が仮想通貨取引所バイナンスのGopax買収審査を約二年半ぶりに再開したと伝えられる。米国での訴訟取り下げが背景で、今年中の役員変更承認の可能性もある。
